subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Buffalo Sabres All-Star Thomas Vanek will be sidelined three to four weeks after having surgery to repair a fractured jaw. Vanek, whose 32 goals ranks third in the league, was hurt in the first period Saturday night in Ottawa after being struck in the face by a slap shot by Senators defenseman Anton Volchenkov.
